name: What was
description: Humanity has expanded into the cosmos setting foot on every planet and rock they can find. But with Humanity comes war with humanity fighting against themselves for money and resources a war that scales the entire galaxy. You find yourself waking up on a heavily damaged ship adrift in space, with no crew in sight and no memory of what has happed you must find your way around the ship searching for clues. Only clue you will find is in audio form that you will use to piece together the final story. With no weapon you better hope nothing tries to hurt you
